# Friendica

Decentralized social network with support for multiple protocols (ActivityPub, Diaspora, etc.).

Connects with Mastodon, Diaspora, and even older systems.

Strong focus on privacy and data portability.

See also → [ActivityPub](/EN/concepts/activitypub) · [Thesis 15](/EN/theses/thesis-15) · [friendi.ca](https://friendi.ca/)
